title: Daniwahyu007
author: Daniwahyu007
content: INNOVATOR CHAIN (INOV8)INNOVATOR 是一个开创性的区块链生态系统，旨在为寻求进入区块链领域的公司和开发人员提供一个安全的生态系统。 它为用户提供了进入区块链世界的安全高效的切入点，使他们能够利用这一变革性的优势 技术。INNOVATOR 不仅仅是区块链。 它是创新的催化剂。 开发人员可以利用融资选项在链上启动他们的项目，为他们提供环保且可持续的解决方案。 通过这样做，INNOVATOR支持基于区块链的应用程序和服务的开发，使其成为开发人员将他们的想法变为现实的理想平台。即将推出的产品和实用程序Decentralized ExchangeAutomated Market MakerBridging Services & ExplorerIntegrated WalletsNFT-Market & SaaS Defi Marketplace Technology (Defi Shopify)Launchpad代币经济学Name: InnovatorTicker: INOV8Algorithm: Nominated Proof of Stake (NPoS)Block time: 6 SecondsEpoch: 3 hoursERA: 6 hoursInflation: Ideal 10%Genesis Release Date: By End of November 2023Substrate: EVM: Full EVM Substrate /Solidity compatiblePremine: 20 Million INOV8创新者验证者许可证目前可在 https://innovatorchain.com31 个许可证已售出。每个许可证的价格上涨 - 目前每个许可证 0.25e区块链主网将于 2023 年 11 月底启动。链接和媒体 Website: https://innovatorchain.com App: https://app.innovatorchain.com (under development) Testnet Explorer: https://devexplorer.innovatorchain.com/ Medium: https://medium.com/@innovatorchain Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/innovatorchain/ Whitepaper: https://innovatorchain.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/INNOVATOR-Whitepaper-V4.pdf Socials  Discord: https://discord.innovatorchain.com Telegram: https://t.me/Innovator_chain Twitter: https://twitter.com/INNOVATORCHAIN注意： 我不是这个项目的团队成员。 我只是一个线程设计师而已。 如果您需要了解有关该项目的更多信息，请直接通过电报或电子邮件与他们联系 - marketing@innovatorchain.com

comments.author: ovladmirs
comments.body: 办公地址 WEB3 Development & Services Limited Rm 22b, 侨贤商业大厦22楼 湾仔骆克道361-363号 香港 电子邮件地址 marketing@innovatorchain.com

comments.author: ovladmirs
comments.body: Network Name: Innovator ChainChain RPC: https://rpc.innovatorchain.com/Chain ID: 129Ticker: INOV8Explorer: https://evm.innovatorchain.com/Thanks Innovator team.

comments.author: ovladmirs
comments.body: Dear Innovator’s,We're thrilled to announce the much-anticipated launch of the INOV8 vesting round, starting tomorrow on December 15th!🌐 INOV8 Token Vesting Details:Date: December 15thDuration: Until 4 million INOV8 tokens are soldLocked period: 2,628,000 blocks (6 Months) tokens released per block.📈 Dynamic Tokenomics:Participate in the vesting round to secure your share of INOV8 tokens, priced at a compelling starting rate of 0.000025 Ethereum (approx. $0.057). With a unique pricing strategy, the token's value increases with each 50,000 INOV8 purchased, promising a climb to $0.24 by the end of the presale as of today’s Ethereum price.Presale Links: https://app.innovatorchain.com/presale
